name: OrthoRoute GPU Autorouter
description: GPU-accelerated PCB autorouter using CUDA/CuPy with KiCad IPC API
description_full:
OrthoRoute is a high-performance GPU-accelerated PCB autorouter that leverages NVIDIA CUDA through CuPy for parallel routing algorithms using KiCad's modern IPC API.

Features:
• GPU-accelerated wavefront routing with conflict resolution
• Process isolation for maximum KiCad stability
• Real-time visualization of routing progress
• Support for multi-layer boards
• Configurable routing parameters
• Compatible with complex PCB designs

Requirements:
• KiCad 9.0+ with IPC API support
• NVIDIA GPU with CUDA support
• CUDA Toolkit 11.8+ or 12.x
• CuPy package
